projects.name: FrontierZ Launcher
projects.description: Desktop VideoGame Launcher. QT Framework front end via Pyside6. Pulls server images, banners, and install data from server owners endpoint. RSS feed integration to host news/updates from server owners to user. Users can add personal servers. Data hosted locally via SQLite3 implementation.

projects.name: IrrPortfolio
projects.description: Personal Portfolio Website. ASP.NET Core MVC backend and REACT frontend with bootstrap, reactstrap, react-router for dynamic pages. User Role Auth/Identification via Claims JWT token on Identity. Github GraphQL API endpoints on back-end. Integrated irrResume page. Full blog implementation and Web Api Access.

projects.name: RustPSM
projects.description: Vue based SPA website running on Node.js and Express. Users enter a SteamID and a unique page is created showing stats pulled from Rust(Game) API. Data is then stored in a MongoDB Atlas server for easier loads, and large scale data collection

projects.name: IrrResume
projects.description: This resume is a JSON Schema wrapped by a REACT.js webpage that is then converted to PDF. Integrated into my portfolio website.

projects.name: wikiNotes
projects.description: My personal Wiki for notes and research running on a docker-container with SQLlite3, hosted on a rasberry pi 4.

work.name: Campus Advantage
work.summary: Followed up with prospects via phone, email, and personal tours to close leases. Managed, scheduled, and hosted events for current residents. A resource for current residents to help with maintenance/emergency calls, questions/concerns, and mediate issues. Participated in and hosted advertising, tableing, and other outreach for prospective clients.
highlights: Hundreds of Full Year Leases Completed
YTD Lease % increase upto 20% each year

other.name: WCStudios
other.description: Ran a small gamedev studio running rpgmaker, mainly making small mod solutions for other games

other.name: CPA Shadow
other.description: Shadowed a CPA. Participating in meetings, completed bookkeeping tasks, and reviewed a business's finances
